input.sentences: a friend of mine got us tickets to a concert that was taking place at the local fairgrounds .
we got there early because there was open seating .
we left one of our friends with our blanket and went to score some food .
even though it was pretty hot out the concert was great .
we had a great time dancing and enjoying the music together .
output.sentences: I am taking my tickets to the county fair grounds for the concert.
We got there in time to get good seating.
A score of my friends left early before getting hotdogs.
It was pretty hot at the concert.
We all had a good time and enjoyed the concert.
